name: ice-fang
flavor_text: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
